hooks.command: echo '=== MULTI-AGENT METHODOLOGY ===' && if [ -f .claude/CLAUDE.md ]; then sprint=$(grep -oP 'Current Sprint.*?\K\d+' .claude/CLAUDE.md 2>/dev/null | head -1); if [ -n "$sprint" ]; then echo "IN-FLIGHT PROJECT - Sprint $sprint"; else highest=$(ls docs/implementation_*sprint*.md 2>/dev/null | grep -oP 'sprint\K\d+' | sort -n | tail -1); if [ -n "$highest" ]; then echo "IN-FLIGHT PROJECT - Detected Sprint $highest artifacts"; else echo 'PROJECT INITIALIZED - No sprints started yet'; fi; fi; echo 'Sprint artifacts:' && ls -1 docs/implementation_*sprint*.md docs/implementor_brief_sprint*.md 2>/dev/null | head -6 || echo '  (none)'; else echo 'NEW PROJECT - No .claude/CLAUDE.md found'; echo 'Run /multi-agent-methodology:arch-init to get started'; fi && echo '---' && echo 'Tell me if this is wrong: "We are in sprint X"'
